thread.title: Man dies in nightclub horror after being given CPR in front of shocked revellers 'following early hours fight'
thread.title_full: Man dies in nightclub horror after being given CPR in front of shocked revellers 'following early hours fight'

author: Richard Wheatstone
title: Man dies in nightclub horror after being given CPR in front of shocked revellers 'following early hours fight'
text:
News Man dies in nightclub horror after being given CPR in front of shocked revellers 'following early hours fight' Police and paramedics were called to Warehouse nightclub in Stroud, Gloucestershire, at around 2am this morning following reports a man collapsed inside the venue Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Man dies at Gloucestershire nightclub after 'early hours fight' Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A man has died after being given CPR in front of horrified revellers in a busy nightclub. 
Police and paramedics were called to Warehouse nightclub in Stroud, Gloucestershire, at around 2am this morning following reports a man collapsed inside the venue. 
Eye-witnesses reported a fight breaking out on the top floor of the club before emergency crews were called. 
Bouncers and police officers blocked of all exits from the building and clubbers were locked inside for up to two hours as police took details and spoke to witnesses. Read More A man was pronounced dead at the scene (Photo: Gloucestershire Live / SWNS) Police were called to the scene at around 2am 
The DJ reportedly shut off music and instructed revellers over the speaker system as people were spoken to and allowed to leave the club in single file. 
Gloucestershire Police confirmed a death at the club is being investigated but have not released any further details. Police took statements from revellers inside the club (Photo: Gloucestershire Live / SWNS) Read More 
It is not yet known if anyone has been arrested. 
The area remains cordoned off by police this morning. Like us on Facebook
